hero.title: Precision CHQ Wire Processing for Automotive Excellence
hero.subtitle: Leading provider of Cold Heading Quality wire rod processing with state-of-the-art Bell-type Annealing & Spheroidizing furnaces, serving the automotive fastener industry with uncompromising quality standards.

about.title: About Taliman
about.subtitle: Pioneering CHQ Wire Processing
about.description: Taliman Sakhtehaye Felezi Kara has been at the forefront of Cold Heading Quality (CHQ) wire rod processing for over a decade. Our commitment to excellence has made us a trusted partner for automotive manufacturers and fastener producers who demand precision, reliability, and consistent quality.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To deliver superior CHQ wire processing solutions that meet the exacting standards of the automotive industry while supporting technological innovation and operational excellence.

quality.title: Uncompromising Quality
quality.description: Commitment to the highest standards in every process

innovation.title: Technological Innovation
innovation.description: Continuous investment in advanced equipment and techniques

processes.title: Our Processes
processes.subtitle: Specialized CHQ Processing
processes.description: Cold Heading Quality wire rod processing involves precise metallurgical treatment to optimize the material properties for cold forging operations. Our process ensures optimal ductility, uniform microstructure, and consistent mechanical properties essential for automotive fastener production.

info.hours: Business Hours: Saturday to Thursday, 8:00 AM - 5:00 PM
